description: Add Puppet Enterprise credentials to Continous Delivery for Puppet Enterprise through a discovery process.

email.description: The email address associated with the account.

password.description: The password associated with the account.

workspace.description: Designates the workspace that the PE credentials will be created in.

creds_name.description: A unique friendly name for the new credentials.

pe_username.description: Optional. The Puppet Enterprise username to use for the discovery process.

pe_password.description: Required if 'pe_username' is set. The password associated with the 'pe_username'.

pe_token.description: The API token to use for the discovery process. Can be used in place of basic auth.

resolvable_hostname.description: A resolvable internet address where the Continuous Delivery for PE server can be reached. Required only if the agent certificate is not the machine's resolvable internet address.

web_ui_endpoint.description: The endpoint where the web UI can be reached, in the form http://<resolvable_hostname>:<port>. Required if you set the web_ui_port parameter in the cd4pe class during installation.
